name: Soulsland 3: Spider Invasion
description:
Story:
After last battle, new evil Giant spider and his army which include small spiders and evil grunts has captured souls to bottles. World need again Lord Barbarus and his fighting skills. Lord barbarus has again several different swords and health potions which helps him to restore health. This medieval Rpg/Adventure games contains 8 different themed levels, where player mission is to find Giant spider at levels and kill him, after killing spider boss Gate will disappear and souls bottles can save. Giant spider has big army which contain small spiders and other enemies with weapons. Be again hero Lord Barbarus and save the world


Features:
-8 different themed maps
- Different Swords
-Health potions and bonfires to restore players health
- Every level has boss Giant spider who need to be defeated to save souls which are captured to bottles
- Steam achievements
